MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting additional specialist engineers to arrive onsite for further investigation work and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:54 PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020
